name: I love you, but..
description:
💌 A letter!

🎵 Original music!

☕ Coffee shop vibes!

👀 Multiple color options for accessibility and for fun! (hopefully in the future adding text to speech option or voice acting too) 

Everything in the game was made by me. (writing, programming, art, music, sound design)

Please check out my other games 😊

Portfolio: https://mickehhsgames.wixsite.com/mickehh

Tools used: Unity and Ink

Also, if you like the vibe of the game, I made this song ~4 years ago and it has a lot of connections with this game for me.

Nader/Mickehh · Hades - Club Olympus OST! (Original)

If you want to download the soundtrack of the game, you can do that through Bandcamp. Here's my Bandcamp page, follow me there for more music in the future~ 

Thank you Martine, Thomas and Fatma for testing the game! 😄💖
